results.name: Triangular sequence constructed from heights of irreducible representations of semi-simple Lie algebras (exceptional groups plus A1, G2, F4, E6, E7, E8).
comment: The row sums are in A120668.
reference: R. N. Cahn, Semi-Simple Lie Algebras and Their Representations, Dover, NY, 2006, ISBN 0-486-44999-8, p. 139.
E. B. Dynkin, Semisimple subalgebras of semisimple Lie algebras, Amer. Math. Soc. Translations, Vol. ?, 1957, pages ?.
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_, May 22 2007
ext: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 30 2008
